intro: You are supporting Mrs Slade who is experiencing constipation and discomfort. She is reluctant to discuss the issue but needs help. Use empathetic communication to understand her needs and know when to escalate to nursing staff.
description_html:
In this scenario, you will practice discussing sensitive health concerns with a resident who is experiencing constipation. This requires empathy, professionalism, and knowing when to escalate.

Learning objectives:

  • Discuss sensitive topics professionally
  • Recognize when to escalate to nursing staff
  • Provide comfort measures within your scope
  • Encourage hydration and fluids
  • Document concerns appropriately

resident.name: Mrs Slade
goals: admit problem ongoing for nearly a week
link to reduced mobility after ankle sprain

safety.if_red_flag_then: escalate to nurse, encourage hydration, reassure resident

actions.title: Bring water
actions.prompt: You bring a glass of fresh water and place it within Mrs Slade's reach.

actions.title: Contact nurse
actions.prompt: You contact the nurse to escalate Mrs Slade's constipation concerns and ensure she receives appropriate care.
